attributes.action: Go ahead with road pricing only if all of the following concerns are met:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
a) Any scheme must not increase the total national tax burden.

b) realistic, practical and readily available alternatives to car usage must be offered and incentivised (e.g. subsidies for company bus schemes)

c) that controls to address the serious privacy issues associated with vehicle tracking are addressed in a completely transparent manner and are fully supported by the Information Commissioner

d) that the technology is demonstrated to be reliable and cheap before being rolled out

This being the case, we belive that road use charging is a reasonable and viable way to change drivers behaviour (which is the principal cause of congestion).
